Package org.monarchinitiative.lirical.background.vcf

Class SimpleVariant

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.lirical.background.vcf.SimpleVariant
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<SimpleVariant>
@Deprecated(forRemoval=true) public class SimpleVariant extends Object implements Comparable<SimpleVariant>
Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
This class encapsulates data about a variant and its classification as ClinVar pathogenic or likely pathogenic.
Author:
Peter Robinson

    • setGenomeBuildForUrl

      public static void setGenomeBuildForUrl(GenomeBuild assembly)
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      This can be set so that we will correctly build the URL to view the location of mutation in UCSC.

    • isInPathogenicBin

      public boolean isInPathogenicBin()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Returns:
      true if the predicted pathogenicity of this variant is above PATHOGENICITY_THRESHOLD.

    • pathogenicAlleleCount

      public int pathogenicAlleleCount()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Count the number of pathogenic alleles. If this variant is not in the pathogenic bin, then the count is always zero. If the variant is in the pathogenic bin, then the count is 2 if the variant is homozygous, otherwise the count in 1.
      Returns:
      number of pathogenic alleles

    • isClinVarPathogenic

      public boolean isClinVarPathogenic()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.

    • pathogenicClinVarAlleleCount

      public int pathogenicClinVarAlleleCount()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Count the number of ClinVar-pathogenic alleles. If this variant is not called Pathogenic in ClinVar, then the count is always zero. If the variant is ClinVar-pathogenic, then the count is 2 if the variant is homozygous, otherwise the count in 1.
      Returns:
      number of pathogenic alleles that are registered in ClinVar

    • getChromosome

      public String getChromosome()
      Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
      Returns:
      chromosome on which this variant is located. Returns a String such as chr1 or chrY
